channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- 5015 - AENFTXT
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- 5015 - AENFTXT

item.title: CVE-2024-6089|2024-07-17T14:57:56.133Z -- rockwell%20automation -- 5015%20-%20aenftxt
item.description: An input validation vulnerability exists in the Rockwell Automation 5015 - AENFTXT when a manipulated PTP packet is sent, causing the secondary adapter to result in a major nonrecoverable fault. If exploited, a power cycle is required to recover the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-6089|2024-07-16T17:10:21.810Z -- rockwell%20automation -- 5015%20-%20aenftxt
item.description: An input validation vulnerability exists in the Rockwell Automation 5015 - AENFTXT when a manipulated PTP packet is sent, causing the secondary adapter to result in a major nonrecoverable fault. If exploited, a power cycle is required to recover the product.
